titleStmt.title: The principal lawes customes and estatutes of England which be at this present day in vre [sic] compendiously gathered togither for y[e] weale and benefit of the Kinges Maiesties most louing subiect[s] : newely recognized and augmented.
titleStmt.author: Taverner, Richard, 1505?-1575.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A22779 of text S123569 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 9290.5). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

fileDesc.extent: Approx. 158 KB of XML-encoded text transcribed from 102 1-bit group-IV TIFF page images.

publicationStmt.pubPlace: Evanston,IL, Notre Dame, IN, St. Louis, MO

availability.p: This keyboarded and encoded edition of the work described above is co-owned by the institutions providing financial support to the Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership. This Phase I text is available for reuse, according to the terms of Creative Commons 0 1.0 Universal . The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Richard Taverner by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"Exaedibus Richardi Taverneri, per Richardum Bankes typographum."--Colophon.
Pages numbered consecutively on recto only.
Imperfect: print show-through and stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
